prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a green body and a large lily pad on its head.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a frog, wearing a leaf as a hat and looks cheerful.
Generate a design for a cute aquatic creature that loves to play in the rain.
Make a unique Pokemon that combines features of a lily pad and a small humanoid.
Imagine a Pokemon inspired by wetlands, with vibrant green colors and a playful demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats and has a distinct aquatic charm.
Design a Pokemon that has a whimsical look, with green skin and a friendly expression.
